mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT_OUT ( product_id, price, amount, manufactor_id, identify_id, create_user ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{manufactorId}, #{identifyId}, #{createUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT productOut.id,product.brand_id,brand.name brand_name,product.id product_id,product.product_no,product.product_name,tech.id tech_id,tech.name tech_name,thickness.id thickness_id,thickness.name thickness_name,productOut.amount,product.price,identify.id identify_id, identify.name identify_name,productOut.create_user,productOut.create_time FROM t_product_out productOut LEFT JOIN t_product product ON productOut.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON product.identify_id = identify.id

SELECT count(*) FROM t_product_out productOut LEFT JOIN t_product product ON productOut.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON product.identify_id = identify.id
